blue text

Navigational tools used in this course

These are the main navigational tools.  Rewind (return to beginning),
Page advance, Page Back, and Close (X). If the button is grey, it will not be active as a navigational tool.

TOC = Table of Contents.  This will bring up a list of the contents for you to navigate to a specific page.

blue text = linkage.  This will bring up a new window, and directly load the required content into the page.  Ensure you allow for the "pop-up" to occur

When you see this "close" button/icon on a screen - it is the best method to close the window.

Small text/picture windows will appear after clicking on some links, and you can hide/close them by clicking directly on them.
